job.title: Data Engineer - Health Sensing Hardware
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApple is looking for a highly motivated individual with experience in data engineering to join the Health Sensing Hardware team brbrThe successful candidate will be responsible for working with a team of sensing hardware engineers and algorithm engineers to manage and analyze data from user studies to identify key behaviors and establish relevant dependencies brbrThe candidate will be creating tools to consume data from cloud based databases run data quality analysis and root cause outliers The candidate will also be responsible for building tools to streamline the data analyzing with existing DLML algorithms The candidate will also be responsible for communicating and reviewing these findings with the team Responsibilities will span working with the team to ensure data availability and integrity performing datamining and data interrogation communicating findings and working with the team to establish next steps in the sensor development A successful candidate needs to be flexible receptive to ideas from others team oriented and excited to work with colleagues to push the technology Expect this work to include collaborating with multifunctional teams responsible for crafting and producing better sensor technologiesbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brData professional with expertise in Data Science Data Analytics or similarbrbrStrong coding skills with tools such as PythonbrbrExperience developing data analytics systems for earlystage projects to help team learn about unknown dependenciesbrbrExperience interfacing and networking cloud based database AWS etcbrbrFlexible and collaborative willing to work in fastpaced technology developmentbrbrExcellent written and verbal communications skills excellent documentation skillsbrbrKnowledge of DLML strongly preferredbrbrKnowledge of optics physics and electrical engineering is beneficialbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brThe responsibilities of this position includes the following for productsbrbrSolicitconsolidate requirements from sensor engineers for data toolsbrbrBuild data analysis tools and analyze databrbrData quality analysis and outlier analysisbrbrImplement algorithm evaluation toolsbrbrProduce  Present meaningful data visualization to teambrbrDiscover new perspectives for old databrbrFinding opportunities for algorithm improvementsbrbrBuild accessible data warehouse to consolidate analysis resultsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS in Computer Science Electrical Engineering Physics or related fieldbrbr3 years experience in a datadriven industrybrbr brRole Number 200266763brbr
